words.source: H227 conj. + prep. min + adv. אָז 'then'; KJV 'for since', ESV 'for ever since', NASB 'ever since'
H935 Qal perf. 1cs of בּוֹא 'to come, enter'; KJV 'I came', ESV 'I came', NASB 'I came'
H413 prep. 'to, toward'; all trans. agree
H6547 proper name; all trans. agree
H1696 prep. l- + Piel inf. constr. of דָּבַר 'to speak'; KJV 'to speak', ESV 'to speak', NASB 'to speak'
H8034 prep. b- + n.ms + 2ms suff. of שֵׁם 'name'; KJV 'in thy name', ESV 'in your name', NASB 'in Your name'
H7489 Hiphil perf. 3ms of רָעַע 'to be evil, to do evil to'; KJV 'he hath done evil', ESV 'he has done evil', NASB 'he has done harm'
H5971 prep. l- + def. art. + n.ms עַם 'people'; KJV 'this people', ESV 'this people', NASB 'this people'
H2088 def. art. + dem. pron. זֶה 'this'; all trans. agree

H5337 conj. + Hiphil inf. abs. of נָצַל 'to deliver, rescue'; emphatic infinitive absolute reinforcing the finite verb; KJV 'neither hast thou delivered', ESV 'you have not delivered', NASB 'You have not delivered'
H3808 neg. particle; all trans. agree
H5337 Hiphil perf. 2ms of נָצַל 'to deliver, rescue'; with preceding inf. abs. הַצֵּל = emphatic 'you have certainly not delivered'; KJV 'delivered', ESV 'delivered', NASB 'delivered'
H853 direct object marker; untranslated in English versions
H5971 n.ms + 2ms suff. of עַם 'people'; KJV 'thy people', ESV 'your people', NASB 'Your people'
